edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.image

Class HSLImage

  • java.lang.Object

        • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.image.HSLImage

  • public class HSLImage
extends ColorImage
    A color image represented in HSL color space at 3 bytes per pixel.
